control.name: btnApplyColors
control.description: This button illustrates how to apply gradient filling to a progress bar control.

control.name: comboBoxProgressStyle
control.description: This combo box demonstrates how to toggle the filling kind of the progress bar between broken and solid. Note that the progress bar has a single theme-defined style when XP themes are applied.

control.name: checkEditVertical
control.description: This check box illustrates the horizontal and vertical styles of progress bars. Note that changing the progress bar's orientation usually implies changing the control's bounds as well.

control.name: checkEditShowText
control.description: This check box toggles the visibility of the text within the progress bar.

control.name: checkEditShowPercent
control.description: With this check box you can control whether the percentage or the current position information is displayed within the progress bar.

control.name: colorEditTextColor
control.description: This control lets you choose the color of the progress bar's text.

control.name: comboBoxMaxMin
control.windowcaption: Maximum and Minimum Values combo box
control.description: This combo box lets you choose the range of values for the progress bar control. After a range has been selected, the progress bar is reset to its minimum value.

control.name: buttonsMaxMin
control.description: These buttons set the progress bar to its maximum and minimum positions.

control.name: spinEditStep
control.description: This editor lets you set the step value that is used when the progress bar's PerformStep() method is called. This method is called when clicking the editor's Step! button. Note that the step value can be negative.

control.name: buttonsUpDown
control.windowcaption: Variable Increment and Decrement button editor
control.description: These buttons demonstrate how to change the position of the progress bar by custom values. Additionally, they also show how to update the progress bar manually so that it always reflects its current position.

control.name: textEditCurrentValue
control.description: This text editor's content is updated each time the progress bar's position changes.

control.name: checkEditAnimation
control.description: When checked, this check box enables the timer that continuously changes the progress bar's position.

hint.name: comboBoxProgressStyle
hint.hinttext: This setting is in effect in the Flat, UltraFlat and Style3D paint styles
